reviewText:
This is the greatest swing dance video I have ever seen!  Dancing is all about fun, and this video gets you on the dance floor swinging like a pro in no time!

Now if it only was on DVD.....

My husband and I wanted to learn swing dancing so we bought a west coast swing video.  It was all footwork and we were lost.  We even tried a class.....we were lost.  My husband thought that this video would at least be a form of amusment for us.  We put it in and a few times through it we were swinging.  Not just swing dancing, but really kick-butt swing moves that all those "beginners" don't know how to do.  We still don't really know footwork, but nobody cares because we know all the cool moves.  And thats what its really all about anyway...Looking cooler than eveyone else!
